Additions

Mapping it All Out

Obviously, there’s a lot of variables that come into play when we’re doing our initial consultation. We want to make sure that the dimensions are just right, and that it can be accomplished while fitting in seamlessly with the current structure.

During this process, we’ll ask for lots of input from you, such as figuring out how much additional room you’re looking to have, the overall shape and layout you have in mind, and more. It all begins with the design process.

Adding to your Home

Sometimes, the project is more than just re-envisioning your bathroom or kitchen or re-flooring your home. You may be in the market to add entire new rooms onto your home. Whether you feel like your family need some more space in your home or you have that extra room you’ve always wanted to add-on, Carrillo Home Improvement in Dover, NJ is ready to make it all happen.
